thread.title: Smartphone screens get stronger, yet consumers demand more

title: Smartphone screens get stronger, yet consumers demand more
text:
Published By: Denver Post Technology - Yesterday 
Ask a roomful of people to take out their phones, and you're bound to see several with cracked screens....
